Koshigaya（越谷） is accesible on the Tobu-Isesaki line from Ueno or the Musashino line from Tokyo/Funabashi

Koshigaya city has 7 stations within the city boundaries, they are Gamo（蒲生）, Shin-Koshigaya（新越谷）, Koshigaya（越谷）, Kita-Koshigaya（北越谷） and Sengendai（千間代） on the Isesaki Line and 2 stations on the Musashino Line, Koshigaya Laketown（越谷レークタウン） and Minami Koshigaya （南越谷）

In April, the river near Kita Koshigaya station is lined with blossoming sakura (cherry blossom) trees. A walk of about 1 kilometre will bring you to a park that has been filled with the beautiful flowering trees.
Aeon Lakeown opened in 2008 and is one of Asia`s largest shopping centres with over 550 shops
McDonald's and Yoshinoya are right near the train station, as well as several other restaurants and vendor booths.
Tokyo is within easy reach of Koshigaya, about 30 minutes to Ueno (上野） and 50 minutes to Ginza （銀座）
